newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Taffeta limit down on default.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Taffeta limit down on default.

text.p: Textile maker Taiwan Taffeta Fabric plunged the daily seven percent limit in early trade on Wednesday after suffering a share payment default totalling T$108.8 million, brokers said.
After 40 minutes of trade, Taiwan Taffeta had lost T$1.60 or seven percent to T$22.30

Two brokerage houses reported to the Taiwan Stock Exchange Corp that four individual investors were unable to complete delivery of their trading on Taiwan Taffeta on Tuesday, with a payment default totalling T$108.8 million, the exchange said in a statement.
Mike Tsai of Grand Cathay Securities said overall market might not be dampened by the default case, but further selling of Taiwan Taffeta was likely.
